languages.text: "Думаешь, так просто выразить в словах Его суть и величие? {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} — совершенное божество, читающее наши сердца и дарующее нам свой свет. Он вывел людей из тьмы и ужаса, сотворил наш великий дом. Он пережил страдания и боль, от которых стал еще сильнее. Это урок всем нам — нет чистых ни на дне грязнейшего улья, ни в золотых дворцах, а есть они лишь в рядах страждущих".

traits.locale_text: "Думаешь, так просто выразить в словах Его суть и величие? Император — совершенное божество, читающее наши сердца и дарующее нам свой свет. Он вывел людей из тьмы и ужаса, сотворил наш великий дом. Он пережил страдания и боль, от которых стал еще сильнее. Это урок всем нам — нет чистых ни на дне грязнейшего улья, ни в золотых дворцах, а есть они лишь в рядах страждущих".

languages.text: "You think it is so easy to put into words His essence and splendour? The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is the perfect deity that reads our hearts and grants us His light. He led Humanity out of darkness and horror, He created our great home. He experienced torment and pain, which only made Him stronger. That is a lesson to us all — purity is not to be found at the bottom of the dirtiest hive or in golden palaces, but only among the ranks of those who suffer."
languages.original_text: "Думаешь, так просто выразить в словах Его суть и величие? {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} — совершенное божество, читающее наши сердца и дарующее нам свой свет. Он вывел людей из тьмы и ужаса, сотворил наш великий дом. Он пережил страдания и боль, от которых стал еще сильнее. Это урок всем нам — нет чистых ни на дне грязнейшего улья, ни в золотых дворцах, а есть они лишь в рядах страждущих".

traits.locale_text: "You think it is so easy to put into words His essence and splendor? The Emperor is the perfect deity that reads our hearts and grants us its light. He led humanity out of the darkness and horror, He created our great home. He experienced torment and pain, which only made Him stronger. That is a lesson to us all — there is no purity to be found neither on the bottom of the dirtiest hive nor in golden palaces, only in the ranks of those who suffer."

"You think it is so easy to put into words His essence and splendor? The Emperor is the perfect deity that reads our hearts and grants us its light. He led humanity out of the darkness and horror, He created our great home. He experienced torment and pain, which only made Him stronger. That is a lesson to us all — there is no purity to be found neither on the bottom of the dirtiest hive nor in golden palaces, only in the ranks of those who suffer."

He led Humanity out of darkness and horror, He created our great home. He experienced torment and pain, which only made Him stronger. That is a lesson to us all — purity is not to be found at the bottom of the dirtiest hive or in golden palaces, but only among the ranks of those who suffer."

"You think it is so easy to put into words His essence and splendour? The Emperor is the perfect deity that reads our hearts and grants us His light. He led Humanity out of darkness and horror, He created our great home. He experienced torment and pain, which only made Him stronger. That is a lesson to us all — purity is not to be found at the bottom of the dirtiest hive or in golden palaces, but only among the ranks of those who suffer."

"You think it is so easy to put into words His essence and splendour? The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is the perfect deity that reads our hearts and grants us His light. He led Humanity out of darkness and horror, He created our great home. He experienced torment and pain, which only made Him stronger. That is a lesson to us all — purity is not to be found at the bottom of the dirtiest hive or in golden palaces, but only among the ranks of those who suffer."

languages.text: “你觉得，用语言来表达祂的本质与辉煌，会是件很容易的事情吗？{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}是完美的神明。祂读懂了我们的内心，并赐予了我们祂的圣光。祂带领人类走出黑暗和恐怖，创造了我们伟大的家园。祂经历过折磨与痛苦，但这一切只会让祂变得更加强大。这也是给所有人的启示——最纯洁的人既不在污秽的巢都底层，也不在辉煌的宫殿之内，而是在那些受苦者的行列之中。”
languages.original_text: "You think it is so easy to put into words His essence and splendour? The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is the perfect deity that reads our hearts and grants us His light. He led Humanity out of darkness and horror, He created our great home. He experienced torment and pain, which only made Him stronger. That is a lesson to us all — purity is not to be found at the bottom of the dirtiest hive or in golden palaces, but only among the ranks of those who suffer."

traits.locale_text: “你觉得，用语言来表达祂的本质与辉煌，会是件很容易的事情吗？{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}是完美的神明。祂读懂了我们的内心，并赐予了我们祂的圣光。祂带领人类走出黑暗和恐怖，创造了我们伟大的家园。祂经历过折磨与痛苦，但这一切只会让祂变得更加强大。这也是给所有人的启示——最纯洁的人既不在污秽的巢都底层，也不在辉煌的宫殿之内，而是在那些受苦者的行列之中。”

languages.text: «¿Cree que es tarea sencilla expresar con palabras Su esencia y esplendor? El {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} es la deidad perfecta que lee nuestros corazones y nos brinda Su luz. Alejó a la Humanidad de la oscuridad y el miedo y creó nuestro grandioso hogar. Además, pese a sufrir tormento y dolor, logró volverse más fuerte. Es una lección para todos nosotros: uno no halla pureza en lo más profundo de la colmena más sucia ni en los palacios de oro, sino entre las filas de quienes sufren».
languages.original_text: "You think it is so easy to put into words His essence and splendour? The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is the perfect deity that reads our hearts and grants us His light. He led Humanity out of darkness and horror, He created our great home. He experienced torment and pain, which only made Him stronger. That is a lesson to us all — purity is not to be found at the bottom of the dirtiest hive or in golden palaces, but only among the ranks of those who suffer."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cree que es tarea sencilla expresar con palabras Su esencia y esplendor? El {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} es la deidad perfecta que lee nuestros corazones y nos brinda Su luz. Alejó a la Humanidad de la oscuridad y el miedo y creó nuestro grandioso hogar. Además, pese a sufrir tormento y dolor, logró volverse más fuerte. Es una lección para todos nosotros: uno no halla pureza en lo más profundo de la colmena más sucia ni en los palacios de oro, sino entre las filas de quienes sufren».

languages.text: 「彼の本質と素晴らしさを言葉で語ることができるとでも？{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}は我々の心を読み、彼の御光を与えてくださる完璧な神です。彼は人類を闇と恐怖から導き出し、我々の偉大な故郷を創造しました。彼は苦悩と苦痛を経験したことで、より強く生まれ変わりました。それこそが教訓です――純粋さは、もっとも汚れた巣や、黄金の宮廷で見出されるものではなく、苦しむ者たちの中でこそ見出されるものなのです」
languages.original_text: "You think it is so easy to put into words His essence and splendour? The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is the perfect deity that reads our hearts and grants us His light. He led Humanity out of darkness and horror, He created our great home. He experienced torment and pain, which only made Him stronger. That is a lesson to us all — purity is not to be found at the bottom of the dirtiest hive or in golden palaces, but only among the ranks of those who suffer."

traits.locale_text: 「彼の本質と素晴らしさを言葉で語ることができるとでも？{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}は我々の心を読み、彼の御光を与えてくださる完璧な神です。彼は人類を闇と恐怖から導き出し、我々の偉大な故郷を創造しました。彼は苦悩と苦痛を経験したことで、より強く生まれ変わりました。それこそが教訓です――純粋さは、もっとも汚れた巣や、黄金の宮廷で見出されるものではなく、苦しむ者たちの中でこそ見出されるものなのです」

languages.text: "Denkt Ihr, es wäre leicht, seine Essenz und Pracht in Worte zu kleiden? Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} ist die perfekte Gottheit, er liest unsere Herzen und gewährt uns sein Licht. Er führte die Menschheit aus der Dunkelheit und dem Schrecken, und er erschuf unsere großartige Heimat. Er hat Qual und Schmerz durchlitten, aber das hat ihn nur stärker gemacht. Uns allen sei das eine Lektion – Reinheit findet sich nicht am Boden der schmutzigsten Makropole oder in goldenen Palästen, sondern nur in den Reihen derer, die leiden."
languages.original_text: "You think it is so easy to put into words His essence and splendour? The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is the perfect deity that reads our hearts and grants us His light. He led Humanity out of darkness and horror, He created our great home. He experienced torment and pain, which only made Him stronger. That is a lesson to us all — purity is not to be found at the bottom of the dirtiest hive or in golden palaces, but only among the ranks of those who suffer."

traits.locale_text: "Denkt Ihr, es wäre leicht, seine Essenz und Pracht in Worte zu kleiden? Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} ist die perfekte Gottheit, er liest unsere Herzen und gewährt uns sein Licht. Er führte die Menschheit aus der Dunkelheit und dem Schrecken, und er erschuf unsere großartige Heimat. Er hat Qual und Schmerz durchlitten, aber das hat ihn nur stärker gemacht. Uns allen sei das eine Lektion – Reinheit findet sich nicht am Boden der schmutzigsten Makropole oder in goldenen Palästen, sondern nur in den Reihen derer, die leiden."

languages.text: « Vous pensez qu'il est possible d'expliquer Son essence et Sa splendeur avec de simples mots ? L'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} est la déité parfaite qui lit dans notre cœur et nous accorde Sa lumière. Il a sorti l'humanité des ténèbres et de l'horreur, et fondé notre beau foyer. Il a connu le tourment et la douleur, qui n'ont fait que Le rendre plus fort. C'est une leçon qu'il est bon de retenir : on ne trouve pas la pureté au fond d'une ruche souillée ou dans un palais doré, mais parmi les tourmentés. »
languages.original_text: "You think it is so easy to put into words His essence and splendour? The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is the perfect deity that reads our hearts and grants us His light. He led Humanity out of darkness and horror, He created our great home. He experienced torment and pain, which only made Him stronger. That is a lesson to us all — purity is not to be found at the bottom of the dirtiest hive or in golden palaces, but only among the ranks of those who suffer."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pensez qu'il est possible d'expliquer Son essence et Sa splendeur avec de simples mots ? L'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} est la déité parfaite qui lit dans notre cœur et nous accorde Sa lumière. Il a sorti l'humanité des ténèbres et de l'horreur, et fondé notre beau foyer. Il a connu le tourment et la douleur, qui n'ont fait que Le rendre plus fort. C'est une leçon qu'il est bon de retenir : on ne trouve pas la pureté au fond d'une ruche souillée ou dans un palais doré, mais parmi les tourmentés. »

languages.text: "O'nun özünü ve muhteşemliğini kelimelere dökmek kolay mı sanıyorsun? {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}, kalplerimizin içini okuyan ve bize ışığını bahşeden kusursuz ilahtır. İnsanlığı karanlık ve dehşetin içinden çıkarmış, muazzam yuvamızı yaratmıştır. Acı ve ızdırabı tatmış, bu sayede gücüne güç katmıştır. Hepimizin bundan çıkaracağı bir ders var: Saflığı en pis kovanların dibinde veya altından saraylarda değil, yalnızca ızdırap çekenlerin arasında bulabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "You think it is so easy to put into words His essence and splendour? The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} is the perfect deity that reads our hearts and grants us His light. He led Humanity out of darkness and horror, He created our great home. He experienced torment and pain, which only made Him stronger. That is a lesson to us all — purity is not to be found at the bottom of the dirtiest hive or in golden palaces, but only among the ranks of those who suffer."

traits.locale_text: "O'nun özünü ve muhteşemliğini kelimelere dökmek kolay mı sanıyorsun? {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} kalplerimizin içini okuyan, bize ışığını bahşeden, kusursuz ilahtır. Karanlığın ve dehşetin içinde İnsanlığa önderlik etmiştir ve muazzam yuvamızı O yaratmıştır. Acı ve ızdırabı tatmış, bunlar O'nu daha güçlü hâle getirmiştir. Hepimizin bundan çıkaracağı bir ders var: Saflık, en kirli kovanın dibinde veya altından saraylarda bulunamaz, yalnızca acı çekenlerin saflarının arasında bulunabilir."
